fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During full moons, you transform into a werewolf, and can rampage at someone's house that night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you don't select a target, you stay at home and rampage. You learn the names of those who visit you if you rampage at home.
- If you are roleblocked while transformed, you stay home and rampage, and clean all victims as well.
- If you are jailed, you will rampage at the Jailor's house if not executed, cleaning them.
